SEARCH
Package gw.api.modules.rest.framework.v1.query.filters

Interface MonetaryAmountFilterFieldProvider

All Superinterfaces:
FilterField
All Known Implementing Classes:
MonetaryAmountQueryFilterProvider, MonetaryAmountStreamFilterProvider
public interface MonetaryAmountFilterFieldProvider extends FilterField
This interface is a pseudo-filter that cannot be directly used. Its purpose is to provide a way for creating real filters for properties of type MonetaryAmount using either their amount or currency components. The reason for this interface's existence is because when we try to convert schema-declared filterable properties into corresponding entity properties, MonetaryAmount-type schema properties are eventually split into two separate entity properties. However, the conversion expects a one-to-one relationship between schema properties and FilterFields. This interface satisfies that expectation during conversion, while providing the mechanism for extracting the actual desired FilterField at a later time.
